component.text: Activity Identify the best WAN connection technology to support the scenario. Check the best WAN connection technology.
1. <textformat blockindent='14'>Remote offices connect once a day to upload sales orders.</textformat>
2. <textformat blockindent='14'>A company WAN supports voice, video and data connections.</textformat>
3. <textformat blockindent='14'>An organization connects to multiple remote sites but only has one serial interface on their router.</textformat>
4. <textformat blockindent='14'>A company connects to their branch offices and securely transfers classified technical drawings.</textformat>
5. <textformat blockindent='14'>A small real estate company provides support to their sales staff to pick up email from their home offices.</textformat>
You have successfully identified the most appropriate WAN connection technology. Click Next to continue.
Please review WAN connection technology and try again.
